price: Sa'an nan a lõkacin da jama'a biyu suka ga jũna, sai abõkan Mũsã suka ce: "Lalle ne mũ haƙĩ ƙa, waɗanda ake riska ne."
arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā tarāā al-jamʿāni qāla aṣḥābu mūsā innā lamud'rakūna
